text: Antipayuta () is a rural locality (a settlement) and the administrative center of Antipayuta Rural Settlement of Tasovsky District, Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Okrug, Russia. The population is 2,685 as of 2017. == Transport == Antipayuta has an airport.Аэропорт Антипаюта Yamal operates flights with the district center Tazovsky, as well with Nakhodka and Gyda. During the navigable period (mid-July to late September) there is a ferry line between Salekhard and Antipayuta every five daysИртышское речное пароходство: расписание движения на 2011 год == References == Category:Populated places in Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Okrug
title: Antipayuta
